sense.name: collection of data organized into a document
sense.examples: The FBI has maintained a file on each of these men. I saved my files before I logged off the computer. The lawyer asked his assistant to pull a couple of files from the cabinet.

sense.name: arrangement of things into a single line
sense.examples: The children entered the auditorium in single file. Eight squares in a row on a chessboard form a file. The tanks rolled by in file during the military parade.

sense.name: storage cabinet furniture
sense.examples: John has a large oak file in his office. I bought some metal files to store my tax returns in.

sense.name: a hand tool used for smoothing rough surfaces
sense.examples: Mary lent my her nail file to smooth my broken fingernail. John used a metal file to make a notch in the surface.
